original: Indriyabaddhaññeva aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
analyzed: aniccam saṅkhatam paṭicca samuppannam khaya dhammam vaya dhammam virāga dhammam nirodha dhammam vipariṇāma dhammanti

original: nanu anindriyabaddhaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
analyzed: nanu anindriya baddham aniccam saṅkhatam paṭicca samuppannam khaya dhammam vaya dhammam virāga dhammam nirodha dhammam vipariṇāma dhammanti

original: Hañci anindriyabaddhaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci anindriya baddham aniccam saṅkhatam paṭicca samuppannam khaya dhammam vaya dhammam virāga dhammam nirodha dhammam vipariṇāma dhamma no ca vata re vattabbe
an indriya baddham aniccam saṅkhatam paṭicca samuppannam pe
vipariṇāma dhamma tat ca na dukkhanti
vipariṇāma dhamma tat ca na dukkhanti
an indriya baddham aniccam saṅkhatam pe

original: Nanu yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: nanu yat aniccam tam dukkham vuttam bhagavatā

original: Hañci yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: hañci yat aniccam tam dukkham vuttam bhagavatā

original: “anindriyabaddhaṁ aniccaṁ”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: an indriya baddham anicca no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Yathā indriyabaddhassa dukkhassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati, evamevaṁ anindriyabaddhassa dukkhassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatīti?
analyzed: yathā indriya baddhassa dukkhassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati evam evam an indriya baddhassa dukkhassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati iti

original: yathā indriyabaddhaṁ dukkhaṁ pariññātaṁ na puna uppajjati, evamevaṁ anindriyabaddhaṁ dukkhaṁ pariññātaṁ na puna uppajjatīti?
analyzed: yathā indriya baddham dukkham pariññātam na puna uppajjati evam evam anindriya baddham dukkham pariññātam na puna uppajjati iti
